intersect

public static float intersect(Sphere sphere,
                              Ray ray)
Calculate the time of collision between a sphere and a ray. Remember this is not time as in 'real time' it is time as in the mathematical time along the rays path it hits the sphere.

Parameters:
sphere - The sphere
ray - The ray
Returns:
< 0 means no collision, >= 0 means a possible collision

collide

public static javax.vecmath.Vector3f collide(Sphere s,
                                             Ray r)
Finds the exact collision point between a sphere and a ray if one exists.

Parameters:
s - The sphere
r - The ray
Returns:
The collision point if one occurs, null for no collision.
